---
name: Local Brews Coffee
website: https://localbrewcoffee.com
blurb: Artisanal coffee roasters bringing locally sourced, ethically produced coffee to your daily routine.
---

Local Brews Coffee is passionate about bringing the finest locally sourced coffee to our community. We work directly with local farmers and roasters to ensure the highest quality beans while supporting sustainable farming practices.

Our offerings include:
- Single-origin coffee beans
- Custom coffee blends
- Cold brew concentrates
- Coffee brewing equipment
- Monthly coffee subscriptions

We believe in transparency in our sourcing and roasting processes, and we're committed to educating our customers about the journey from bean to cup.
